metadata.synopsis: Male Drow. Guard and Absolute cultist.

0.speaker: Zealot Niram
0.text: To the city, True Soul! The waiting's done.
0.context: InternalNodeContext: The player has kidnapped Isobel and helped return Nightsong and Balthazar to Moonrise. The army of the Absolute is ready to march.NodeContext: Quietly fanatic - can't wait to march

1.speaker: Zealot Niram
1.context: InternalNodeContext: General fallback nodes where none of the above apply. Almost ALWAYS comes after Execution state (directly above)

2.speaker: Zealot Niram
2.context: InternalNodeContext: The player has helped the cult kidnap Isobel and bring her to Moonrise.NodeContext: A blessing / greeting

3.speaker: Zealot Niram
3.text: You bested the Selûnite. You'll have to regale us all over drinks.
3.context: InternalNodeContext: The player has helped the cult kidnap Isobel and bring her to Moonrise.

4.speaker: Zealot Niram
4.text: You'll be the General's favourite after this.
4.context: InternalNodeContext: The player has kidnapped Isobel and helped return Nightsong and Balthazar to Moonrise. The army of the Absolute is ready to march.

5.speaker: Zealot Niram
5.text: Good luck, True Soul. The Disciple demands much of those who serve her.
5.context: InternalNodeContext: General fallback nodes where none of the above apply. Almost ALWAYS comes after Execution state (directly above)
